definition.name: Vertex AI Notebook Review Action
definition.description: Execute notebooks and create links to their output files
definition.author: google-github-actions

inputs.name: gcs_source_bucket
inputs.description: Google Cloud Storage bucket to store notebooks to be run by Vertex AI. e.g. <project-id>/nbr/source

inputs.name: gcs_output_bucket
inputs.description: Google Cloud Storage bucket to store the results of the notebooks executed by Vertex AI. e.g. <project-id>/nbr/output

inputs.name: allowlist
inputs.description: Comma separated list of files to run on Vertex AI. e.g. mynotebook.ipynb, somedir/**.pynb. It is expected that this is the output from an action like ```dorny/paths-filter```

inputs.name: vertex_machine_type
inputs.description: Type of Vertex AI machine to run notebooks on e.g. n1-standard-4

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: Google Cloud region e.g. us-central1, us-east4

inputs.name: add_comment
inputs.description: Add a comment to an open PR as the final step - defaults to "true"

inputs.name: kernel_name
inputs.description: Notebook kernel to use for the execution environment - defaults to python3

inputs.name: vertex_container_name
inputs.description: The base container image to use. Defaults to the basic Python container.
